name: api_rendering_Texture

properties.name: anisoLevel
properties.description: Defines the anisotropic filtering level of the Texture.

properties.name: graphicsFormat
properties.description: Returns the GraphicsFormat format or color format of a Texture object.

properties.name: graphicsTexture
properties.description: GraphicsTexture that represents the texture resource uploaded to the graphics device.

properties.name: height
properties.description: Height of the Texture in pixels.

properties.name: imageContentsHash
properties.description: The hash value of the Texture.

properties.name: isDataSRGB
properties.description: Returns true if the texture pixel data is in sRGB color space.

properties.name: isReadable
properties.description: Whether Unity stores an additional copy of this texture's pixel data in CPU-addressable memory.

properties.name: mipMapBias
properties.description: The mipmap bias of the Texture.

properties.name: mipmapCount
properties.description: How many mipmap levels are in this Texture.

properties.name: updateCount
properties.description: This counter is incremented when the Texture is updated.

properties.name: width
properties.description: Width of the Texture in pixels.

properties.name: wrapMode
properties.description: Options for sampling a texture if a texture coordinate is outside the [0, 1] range.

properties.name: wrapModeU
properties.description: Options for sampling a texture if the U texture coordinate is outside the [0, 1] range.

properties.name: wrapModeV
properties.description: Options for sampling a texture if the V texture coordinate is outside the [0, 1] range.

properties.name: wrapModeW
properties.description: Options for sampling a texture if the W coordinate is outside the [0, 1] range.
